pages.text: $(li)The Heart of the Sea is a very rare item that can be only found in $(l:patchouli:structures/buried_treasure)Buried Treasures$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/conduit)Conduit$(/l), a $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Trident$(/l), or a $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield_of_the_deep)Shield of The Deep$(/l).
